original_text: So Joshua and all the fighting men arose to go up to Ai. And Joshua chose 30,000 mighty men of valor and sent them out by night.
korean_text: 이에 여호수아가 일어나서 군사와 함께 아이로 올라가려 하여 용사 삼만 명을 뽑아 밤에 보내며

sentences.original_text: So Joshua and all the fighting men arose
And Joshua chose 30,000 mighty men of valor
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 용맹한 용사 삼만 명을 뽑고

sentences.original_text: and sent them out by night.
